Key Match Events: Lebanon defender Khalil Khamis landed a kung fu kick on Chinese opponent Dai Wai Tsun in the 23rd minute of the Asian Cup Group A fixture, but the referee decided not to show any card.
Post-Match Reflections: The match eventually ended in a goalless draw which allowed group toppers and hosts Qatar to progress to the knockout stage with six points from their first two matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lebanon held China to a goalless draw
China's future now hangs in the balance after they failed to register a win in their first two group games.
Others: The Cedars will next face Tajikistan in their final group game on Monday while the Dragon's Team face the mighty Qataris in a must-win clash on the same day.
